DOC.brief_summary: Cardiac output (CO) is an important parameter in the diagnosis and therapy of cardiac diseases. The aim of the study at hand was to evaluate NICOM (bioreactance) as a new method for determinion of CO and to compare it to Innocor (inert gas rebreathing), which previously showed promising results.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of NICOM and Innocor for Non-Invasive Determination of Cardiac Output
DOC.criteria: hemodynamic stability respiratory stability patient unwilling to participate
